T-Mobile USA Carier IQ Phone List

December 8, 2011

I’m not going to attempt to discuss the privacy mess that happened with Carrier IQ if you want to read an interview with the head of marketing from Carier IQ . I’m not really that bothered because I root my Android phones, I have an Iphone 4 on IOS 5 on Verizon. If you were following the news Verizon wasn’t a Carrier IQ customer. I bet Verizon has their own system written without frameworks and all custom code. I would love to see that code. Anyway I wanted to list the T-Mobile phones that have Carrier IQ installed because I’m a T-mobile USA customer.

HTC Amaze 4G
Samsung Galaxy S II
Samsung Exhibit II 4G
T-Mobile myTouch
T-Mobile myTouch Q
LG DoublePlay
BlackBerry Bold 9900
BlackBerry Curve 9360
BlackBerry Torch 9810

Galaxy Nexus. Is it really one of the best phones out there?
